description: The alarmtrap with the following attributes:
siamcpAlmNEName, e.g. Adtran/domain/my58 (Hierarchically to accomodate domains inside the EMS)
siamcpAlmState, e.g. on, off or other for acknowledged
siamcpAlmText, e.g. AC Failure, gives also correction procedure
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::adtranSiamcpAlarm ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmTimeAndDate s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmIPAddr s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmNEType s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmNEName s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmSeverity i 7 ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmState i 3 ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmIdentity s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmText s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmResource s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::adtranSiamcpAlarm ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmTimeAndDate s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmIPAddr s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmNEType s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmNEName s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmSeverity i 6 ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmState i 3 ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmIdentity s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmText s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmResource s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::adtranSiamcpAlarm ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmTimeAndDate s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmIPAddr s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmNEType s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmNEName s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmSeverity i 2 ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmState i 2 ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmIdentity s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmText s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmResource s EXAMPLE

description: This trapvariable contains the time and date the alarm appeared in format 2016-04-12T23:20:50.52Z, time in UTC
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmTimeAndDate

description: This trapvariable contains the IP address of the NE, e.g. 192.168.153.58
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmIPAddr

description: This trapvariable contains the type of the NE that issued the alarm
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmNEType

description: This trapvariable contains the name of the NE that issued the alarm
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmNEName

description: This trapvariable contains the alarm severity (critical, major, minor, warning, informational)
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmSeverity

description: This trapvariable contains the alarmstate (on or off)
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmState

description: This trapvariable contains the alarm identity
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmIdentity

description: This trapvariable contains a textual description of the alarm, gives also correction procedure
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmText

description: This trapvariable contains the location of the alarming unit
variables.name: ADTRAN-SIAMCP-MIB::siamcpAlmResource
